p: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target.
q: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
w: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
e: Grants Annie increased percentage Damage Reduction, a burst of Movement Speed, and damages enemies who attack her with basic attacks.
r: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
